title: so i think my Email just got hacked.
body: I went to change my email, and a code to change the email was sent to hellisho@hotmail.com. I would please like to have this change reverted somehow.

replies.body: Any account changes like this need to be done through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Reach out to our account recovery agents and they'll be able to help out after verifying your as the original creator.
did you submit a ticket? if not do it right now.
why isnt there a support worker atleast ONE working this forum board at almost all times... i dont understand
to clarify i do not own this email.
